notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Data collection: H.E., J.P., P.K., A.R., H.Ś., A.S.; design of the study: H.E.; analysis and interpretation of the data: H.E., J.P., P.K., A.R., H.Ś., A.S.; drafting the manuscript: H.E., J.P., P.K., A.R., H.Ś., A.S.; critical revision of the manuscript: H.E., A.S. All authors read and approved the manuscript in its final form. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
